headline: Glittering Proxies Lend 2020 Democrats a Hand
abstract: Hollywood stars are making their way to Iowa and South Carolina. Will they change anyone’s mind?
lead_paragraph: SUMTER, S.C. — Bernice Harris was with her granddaughter Saturday afternoon when they heard a surprising rumor: Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont was going to visit their city later that day, holding a rally at an African Methodist Episcopal Church.
